name: Spext Labs Inc.
description: Developer of an online platform designed to make voice media creation as easy and ubiquitous as text. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to fuse speech and text to automate transcription, voice editing, and repurposing of voice content, enabling users to convert recorded content into useful content faster.
one_liner: Developer of an online platform designed to make voice media creation as easy and ubiquitous as text. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to fuse speech and text to automate transcription, voice editing, and repurposing of voice content, enabling users to convert recorded content into useful content faster.
